update.description: this PR will add a splash screen to the gazebo startup, so that something will happen for the user while it is downloading models. then impatient users (like me) won't think it's broken and ctrl+C the program before it starts up.

update.description: this PR will add a splash screen to the gazebo startup, so that something will happen for the user while it is downloading models. then impatient users (like me) won't think it's broken and ctrl+C the program before it starts up.
update.title: splash screen

content.raw:
The splash screen now shows up grey while models are being downloaded. We had a `showMessage` here before to force it to repaint after `show()`.  To fix it the current version we can just add the line:
~~~
  this->dataPtr->splashScreen->repaint();
~~~
content.html:
The splash screen now shows up grey while models are being downloaded. We had a showMessage here before to force it to repaint after show(). To fix it the current version we can just add the line:

  this->dataPtr->splashScreen->repaint();

content.raw: The text was very small at first, so I made it a bit bigger. I can get a screen shot of the original. The display resolution is 576X320px. Alternatively we could make the splash screen bigger.
content.html: The text was very small at first, so I made it a bit bigger. I can get a screen shot of the original. The display resolution is 576X320px. Alternatively we could make the splash screen bigger.

content.raw: I guess as long as "Simulation made easy" and "Preparing your world" are the same width, it's ok.
content.html: I guess as long as "Simulation made easy" and "Preparing your world" are the same width, it's ok.
